website_summaries.verdict: Generous dimensions combined with a plush fleece lining delivers extra warmth and fuller protection from the elements. A solid choice for windy or rainy climates.
pros: Showerproof shell provides excellent water resistance
Thick fleece lining is comfortable and toasty
Extended back, sides, and front keep sensitive areas warm and dry
Easy to put on and take off
Can be used with a leash
cons: No reflective features for nighttime use

customer_reviews.title: Chest strap not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Nice coat but the sizing didn't help me. The sizing suggestions on the side is much better. I attached photos. The one thing that won't work for us is the chest. It's not adjustable so it actually falls down so he can't walk. My guy has a super long back and is small chested, he's a Great Dane mix. I think it's his make-up. I am trying a smaller size in hopes it fits better. If not then I'm sure I can find a rescue that can use one. I DO love the coat! Nicely made!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and perfect for chilly, *dry* weather
customer_reviews.text: We have a beagle and she starts shivering once the temp drops below 45. This is perfect for keeping her warm. We're lazy city folk and value dog accessories that aren't a chore to put on. The Weatherbeeta slips right over her head and velcros to the sides. There's no danger in it slipping off and it keeps our dog comfy. Also, the leash opening location aligns well with our EzyDog harness (the same cannot be said for the 1200D parka). The one downside is that it's *only* a windbreaker. If it's also raining outside, you'll want something else because water will soak right through this.
customer_reviews.author: Shep C. James

customer_reviews.title: Fits Doberman!!!! Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: Any Dober Mom or Dad knows how hard it is to find a dog coat that will fit. I have one smallish male (80 lbs)and one freakishly large female(90 lbs) and these coats fit perfectly. I bought the 24" for him and 26" for her. Gets nub coverage yet does not interfere with potty functions 1 or 2 for either of them. Super warm, rain resistant and super easy to put on and take off wiggly dogs. LOVE LOVE LOVE these coats!! Buy it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Candy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit...might order up for certain breed types
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of ordering this coat in the same size as every other weatherbeeta coat that my dog wears. It is true to size in the back length however my dog has a substantially deep chest and with the design of this coat the chest piece pulls the coat farther forward and lifts the back end. The end result is this coat fits her great only if she is standing stock still and since she is a active dog that is extremely rare. If she is running around the back of this coat is flapping up and down with a several inches of Doberman keister sticking out. She doesn’t care but I wish it were a smidge longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my great dane! He gets cold fast and living in northern Michigan it can get sub zero. I got the 32" and it fits him pretty good. The only change I might make to it is to add rear leg straps to keep it from shifting. My dog loves wearing it and doesn't want me to take it off, so I guess it has his vote too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought these coats for all my dogs through the years. As they grow so the need for another coat arises. I love this coat, easy to put on, wash really well, never had any issues with it getting wet right through. I now have 2 shorthair dogs and these keep them covered, dry and warm. My guys appreciate the collar that can flip up to almost their ears. Best dog coat on the market in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Spokane WA

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two of these and had to return one to the store because it wasn't big enough for my Dane. I then found them on Amazon and bought the size for my Dane. They are easy on easy off and they keep my Danes dry except for their heads which is okay those are easy to dry. My girls aren't crazy about the wind so I'm hoping that this gives them a little more Comfort when they're outside walking on windy days. Quality seems nice the fleece lining seems like it would be warm. I'm glad I found one big enough for both my dogs. A lot of other ones didn't come big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat for my Cattle Hound and 60lb.Pit bull.
customer_reviews.text: 45 lb. female cattle hound and 60lb. female pitbull that measure length wise about the same except for chest area. Of course the pitbull is much broader and deeper around the chest area but this coat works great for both in 22 inch size. Easy on/ off and both dogs love the coat and actually will sit still while I put it on(miracle). Well made with a medium lining that seems perfect as far as warmth. Covers the belly and cinches up nice with straps. Works great with Harness Leash type leashes. Quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: FredH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Weatherbeeta dog coats are absolutely the best on the market. They are well-sewn with excellent quality fabric. The velcro is industrial strength and does not wear out. I wash the coats in cold water with the velcro straps closed, so they don't stick to one another. I have line-dried them and also put them in the dryer on extra low heat. This coat has a nice faux fur lining which is good for a cool early spring or fall day here in Iowa. It can be difficult to find coats with the chest flaps. Weatherbeeta makes several of this kind in different weights.
customer_reviews.author: Ken McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Not the description listed
customer_reviews.text: The coat I received is a great coat but not the description listed. It is not waterproof, nor does it have reflective strips. It is however a nice windbreaker. They run large fyi, and the 26 is like a toasty blanket on my Catahoula.
customer_reviews.author: iam

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my Great Dane, (145lbs and TALL) and it's the first ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Great Dane, (145lbs and TALL) and it's the first coat that fits and covers all of his body well. I love the velcro adjustable belly wrap. My dog was kept warm and dry in very challenging conditions this last NYC winter. He looked good too, lots of compliments. The neck opening is a bit wide hence the 4 out of 5 stars but I would most certainly buy it again. Great XXL dog coat.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We love this coat so far. It has made a Michigan winter bearable for our newest addition from Texas. We have a Great Dane and it fits him great. It is very easy to get on and off. Best of all he can relieve himself with no issues. The only knock I have is on the slot to clip in a harness. I wish it was a two way or four way, whatever it is called a + instead of a -. Our harness is perpendicular to this opening and when he gets excited on a walk it really puts stress on the seam. Hopefully it holds up and I am worrying over nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harper

customer_reviews.title: weatherbeeta dog coat
customer_reviews.text: This the best coat ever my chocolate Labrador loves it. She can run with it on without any problem. She wears it on the very, cold days indoors without worry of her getting tangled. I also found that the seller is located fairly close to my home so we will be making a trip to see them in, the near future . Great rain weather coat and the fit is excellent. The fabric doesn't stretch or sag, which is a problem with another item that I purchased. The dog loves it and enjoys wearing it. I would recommend this item for dog owners looking for a high quality product large, medium and small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Gladiator

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Kept dogs warm.
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from back country camping with the dogs, where the night time lows ranged from teens to low 20's. The dogs never bugged me to climb into my sleeping bag, as they have done in the past when it was cold. I bought the sizes 26" and 30" for two working (to give you a picture of size and stature) German Shepherds. The 26" one fits my normal sized 70lbs shepherd perfect, and the 30" one fit my very tall and long 89lbs shepherd perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SemperFi

customer_reviews.title: Warm and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: This coat was just what we needed for our yellow lab. She weighs 75lbs. And the coat was a perfect fit. It is not uncomfortable or binding. The coverage is a plus. She stayed warm in temperatures under 30 degrees. The top closure makes this coat easy to put on and take off. It keeps her underbelly dry when the grass is wet. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Redding

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat!
customer_reviews.text: Great coat! We used it when our dogs lost their hair. It was used on 3 separate dogs at different times. We put it on at night and took it off during the day. When left on all day without supervision it did get torn, but not bad at all. So far it has held up really well! The only thing I don't like is the wool inside. It gets dirty easy and is hard to clean because everything sticks to the inside. It does hold up well in the rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Weatherbeeta, not just for my horse
customer_reviews.text: As a cowgirl Weatherbetta is a brand I know for horse blankets. Finding out that my dog can wear Weatherbetta is a slice of heaven for me. I LOVE the fact that the coat secures by going down my dogs chest and around his legs. Trust me, he has tried numerous times to take it out and has failed. The weight of the coat is perfect for rain and wind and the white on the coat seems to be reflective. The price was excellent! I will admit that I have bought several coats and will continue to but more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for windy and rainy days
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a yorkie and a lhaso. Both coats fit great and in MN, blocks the wind chill just perfectly. We are able to make walks outside a little longer and the dogs do well running and playing in the coats. The way these fasten is much better than other brands, with the velcro coming around to the sides. Other coats have caught hair in velcro and than hurts. We are completely happy with these and will buy again when necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Basically a shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: No lining at all .. just a flimsy shower curtain with velcro.. Also the 3x was to baggy around neck area, for my 89 pound full size , purebred long-haired shepherd,, the lenghth was good tho , fully covered back. I think it would work if you wanted to put it over your dog's favorite sweater or coat as a shield..
customer_reviews.author: marci

customer_reviews.title: Yes, there is a coat for a larger dog!
customer_reviews.text: I have a PetSmart and a PetCo right near my home and a Nautical Dog and none of them carry a coat large enough for my 2-year old German Shepherd. Last year I bought him a coat that was size 30 (whatever that means). Even when I went on line I discovered that there weren't that many coats available. This coat is well made and covers his chest and part of his stomach which his last winter coat didn't protect. I am truly impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Fischer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jacket it fits large
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket it fits large. We measured our dog and ordered the recommended size but it's a bit big on her, perhaps because she's on the thin side so take into account your dog's shape when you order. Go one size up for fatter dogs and one size down for skinner dogs.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyMagnet2004

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the durability of this coat. Had it for about a week our small cocker spaniel/chihuahua mix just runs around an open field in it and its already falling apart at the seams. Although it looks very cute and seems to keep him warm it costs too much to only last a week. Maybe if you strictly have an indoor dog this could work but I think the point of it is for outside dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: Nice  material and fabric and super bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pullover or something that you would put over another jacket but love how easy it is to put on and take off and don’t have to hassle around with the pup and it’s a very bright yellow so no one will miss you walking down the road in the dark especially with the reflection spots they have on it definitely stretch’s if you get a bigger size but definitely wouldn’t put it on alone in the wintertime if it gets super cold like here in Alaska that’s why I used it as a pullover
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!
customer_reviews.text: The coat is easy to put on and take off with minimal concern by my dog. Other coats did not work since my dog has a big chest, however, the fit was perfect with the Weatherbeeta. I liked the wide variety of sizes which made this possible. The construction of the coat is much better than I expected.....a good value! My dog seems to look forward to having it put on!
customer_reviews.author: GSDs

customer_reviews.title: I really like this coat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coat, I think Zeke does too. Buying dog coats online is tough. All the comments I was seeing said if your not sure go bigger. I wonder if maybe I went to big. Zeke is 150lb mastiff/rottweiler, while the coat is long enough I feel like the neck opening may be too big because the coat tends to pull towards the rear. Regardless, I've been thru a couple different coats for him trying to find one big enough and this one does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JEH

customer_reviews.title: well made and comfortablee
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a couple of years ago and have washed it several times. Still looks brand new. So ordered one for our half grown pup. As you can see it's a bit big on him, but still no problems with him being able to go potty without soiling it. He is quickly growing into it. These are easy to put on and the fur kids seem to love them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking coat.
customer_reviews.text: Great coat for dogs. I have a pit with a 32" chest and about 18" long. Ordered the 22" coat and though it's a little long still room in the chest for a larger dog. I like the collar so if it's snowing, won't go down his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coat
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three Weatherbeeta coats, over the years, for our long-haired dogs. (Minimizes mats from rain or snow... less brushing.) This one, a lighter coat, is just as excellent as the last two.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: The length is fine but it's a little wide through the chest for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought size 22 for our 40 lb Golden Doodle. The length is fine but it's a little wide through the chest for her, but it keeps her warm and dry. It's managed to survive the winter snow runs/fights/tag games with the larger 80 lb pup.
customer_reviews.author: Pali

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Runs large so consider downsizing. Neck opening is very large for a Standard Poodle but good for a large lab. I need to return it for size, if I can find out how.
customer_reviews.author: M. Glick

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, but too big.
customer_reviews.text: The coat seemed to be exactly what I was looking for for my pup, however I measured him prior to ordering, ordered the appropriate length (20”) but found the jacket unuseable as It was too big around the chest/neck area. I am returning the jacket in exchange for a smaller size, which will not be long enough to cover my dogs full back, but will hopefully fit home better overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: easy on
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my daughters dog and mattie the dog absolutely loves this coat it keeps her chest warm and she is a big show off she is part lab and great dane. wonderful personality soooo gentle
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Messer

customer_reviews.title: superb product - very happy dobermans!
customer_reviews.text: our dobies are very short haired 'think nearly bald' - and struggle with temp changes badly. tehse mid weight windbreakers are great for wind, rain, drizzle, fog ... and a fairly wide range of tempperatures!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Cross

customer_reviews.title: Well made but be careful about picking size
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Water resistance is good. Easy to put on. Sizing is awkward for a dog like mine with a long, lean body. The best fit for my dog's chest is the 16” length, but that’s short for the length of his body so more of him is exposed on the back end. Ask them to send you their full measurement chart. (Note: doesn’t work with Sense-ation harness which requires leash to be clipped in the space between the two front legs.) I wish the collar area stayed closer to the neck.
customer_reviews.author: OffTheLeash

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Value, Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I have a Boston Terrier and this jacket fit wonderful on her it hard to find jackets that will fit her correctly because of her wide chest. Picture to come...
customer_reviews.author: WeSeyDogs

customer_reviews.title: It's Weatherbeeta!
customer_reviews.text: I use Weatherbeeta on my horses so buying a dog coat or 4 did not even cause me to blink. I LOVE the coat. It is rugged, warm and durable. I LOVE the way the coat wraps around the chest and velcros on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my dog warm and dry in the rain. Not too bulky but still warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sinistral_leo

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very stylish for a dog! LOL! She looks awesome and I can see her in the forest. Although, I got a size that is a bit big ... she can run out of it somehow. I'm afraid she can get hooked up on something in the forest so I leash her when she has it on. She gets all kind of compliments and it keeps her warm when it's below 32 degrees and we will be outside for an extended time.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Medium Warmth , Tailored Fit .  It's A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Medium Warmth, Tapered Fit Near Dog's Rump, Super Sturdy Velcro. My only issue is that the collar is really long. If you have a dog with a super short neck, this might not be the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: scentinel

customer_reviews.title: Weatherbeeta....excellent dog jackets
customer_reviews.text: Weatherbeeta!! My favorite jackets for my dogs!! I bought Romeo a new jacket this year although his other one is still great.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Laddie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is perfect for my boy! PA winters can be chilly! Great in heavy rain too.
customer_reviews.author: tirednurse

customer_reviews.title: So easy to get these coats onto the dog
customer_reviews.text: They are not only easy to securely fit on the dog but the dogs don't try to remove them. They fit snuggly with just two adjustments on the sides. I have 8 dogs and they all have their Weatherbetta coat.
customer_reviews.author: LoveKinderKids

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry in all weather
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my dog in all weather. He is low to the ground and keeps the underside dry. Bought it in yellow so he shows up well after dark. Already had one for my other dogs and wanted a second so I didn't have to swap them from one dog to the other.
customer_reviews.author: dtbartow

customer_reviews.title: Finally Big dog jackets that fit
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is big enough not to be tight around chest/belly. My girl (11 year old Rottweiler/Doberman) loves this, it covers the underside as well as back. Long enough to get the hind quarters. Now if I could only get it in pink so she doesn't look so scary and a raincoat with hood.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Seidl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect. Easy to put on. Great material. Daisy is a mastiff bulldog mix. This blanket is adjustable and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: frankie cross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept my older buddy warm and comfortable this winter. Definitely a good coat for an active dog.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Boomer loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit My Australian Shepherd Boomer loves it when the temperature goes below 30 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Bob 6907

customer_reviews.title: Measurement to size not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is fine probably the best you can find on amazon. However if you measure 20" from the neck to the tail on your dog and buy a jacket that is the 20" size you receive a 16 in. Jacket that says 20 in. on it. It did barely fit my dogs it should have covered more of there rump. Also it barely fit around. They need a 24" which s not sold in this style.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dog Coat!
customer_reviews.text: Water repellant outside, warm fleece inside. Easy on, Easy off! Reflective cover and it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice high quality product, but getting the size right was an issue unfortunately . In the end we had to return it and the size we need was not available
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Boujee Basenji
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. My basenji mix HATES going outside when it rains, but this waterproof jacket helps! Easy to use, adjustable fit, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: ggheck

customer_reviews.title: Great coat & keeps dog dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our Weimaraner and it fits perfect! Love how this one secures on the sides versus under the belly. Easy to put on too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: should be breed specific
customer_reviews.text: Size was right but didn't close around my boxer's chest. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great coat for Italian Greyhound
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Italian Greyhounds, one 7 pounds, one 10 pounds. The 12" size fits the little one great, and the 14" fits the bigger one. They keep them so warm any cozy especially since they have almost no body fat and thin fur. The outside is very sturdy rain resistant and the inside keeps them so warm. A great coat!
customer_reviews.author: RSVIGGY

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: Ziggy lives his new jacket. It’s easy to put on and take off. I wanted the collar to stay a bit better so I sewed a piece of elastic on it that goes under his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Da

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and so easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and so easy to put on. He weighs 140lbs if that helps at all. Slips right on and now when I grab it he knows he can go outside. Before he would go out to pee for 5 min tops. Now he stays out for 30-40min
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a large dog
customer_reviews.text: This coat actually fits a large dog, very bright so its hard to misplace , Easy to put on and take off.When it says xxx large it is, the last one we ordered was a triple X but only covered half there back. Great coat for large dog at 100lbs
customer_reviews.author: Michael DoLdrums

customer_reviews.title: returned ordered wrong size
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nick dog coat bought for my daughters second dog and she measured wrong am returning and reordering smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Messer

customer_reviews.title: I have a Schipperke and this fits her perfectly. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Schipperke and this fits her perfectly. It's not heavy so it doesn't make her too warm in cold weather..
customer_reviews.author: WELdone

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits a great dane fine from 90lbs to 130
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: fits pup well and she loves it! Having a zipper to allow more coverage of the belly would be nice, but the tall collar is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: headshooter13

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coat
customer_reviews.text: The coat fits my golden-doodle very nicely. As others have said the slotted hole for the leash is too low, it’s almost between his shoulders. I use a harness so it doesn’t affect the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven See

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Heavy with fleece lining. It keeps my Rottweiler/Mastiff warm and dry! Only issue is that it gets soiled on bottom. (See my video)
customer_reviews.author: Rononline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service from One Stop Equine Shop and Amazon Prime.  😎
customer_reviews.text: I think Weatherbeeta dog coats are the best and these new ones will be great for several more years. I have two other sets of them that will be retired now that the new ones have arrived. They were delivered very quickly, I only ordered them a few days ago. Very happy with Amazon Prime and the One Stop Equine Shop in Lexington KY. 😎🐶🐶
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit bully breed very well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and material. Unfortunately on my boy a bully breed a size down would be too small and the size we got is almost too big. It seems to be rubbing in his front arm pits. I may need to get my mom to alter it a little with her sewing skills.
customer_reviews.author: Somer Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Best value based quality K-9 coat in the market
customer_reviews.text: By FAR the best K-9 manufacturer, first coat is 2+ years old, hundreds of washing’s and still performing flawlessly. Bella is a working dog who must wear OSHA Fluorescent yellow on our construction projects. These coats ( 3 different weights ) are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure your animal before hand. A proper fit is important.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 28in for my 110lb great dane. Fits perfectly. I wasnt expecting much for the price but I am pleasantly surprised by just how warm and well put together it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the biggest ones to make sure it fit my boxmas and my American bully. It fits them LG bit it fits them. They love it. Maybe a small adjustment around the legs to fit better other than that I would purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Professional hooker

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for our lab. Fit is great and the workmanship is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you get the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Should have ordered a size smaller but it's a great coat. Be aware that if it's too big it can cause rub marks on your dog. Mine won't go outside without it!
customer_reviews.author: ChefWeeWee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: JUST AS A SECOND THOUGHT THE YELLOW COLOR LOOKS LIKE A LIME GREEN. JUST SAYING. LOVE IT ANY WAY.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Velez-Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Great coat for winter to keep the dog warm and protected by winter weather. Item arrived on time, great seller.
customer_reviews.author: cristol m klevinsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my 125 pound Pitbull warm when he goes out in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Stan116

customer_reviews.title: Basing the size off of 3 different measurements is smart. Easy to put on and take off too
customer_reviews.text: First coat that fits my dog correctly! Basing the size off of 3 different measurements is smart. Easy to put on and take off too! Only suggestion is to add a loop inside the collar (like a human coat) so that it can easily be hung up on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Great Windbreaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love my jacket. It's totally comfy, and handles pouring rain very well! I don't run away when mom brings it out, so she's happy as well. Solid product and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Hootie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dog coat
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to clean. Also simple to put on & take off. Keeps my pup warm. The length fits fine, but it’s loose in the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: kengster13.blogspot

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more of these.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, warm, easy to put on. They stay on and stay in place even when the dogs are running around.
customer_reviews.author: P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love how it fits perfectly true to size and when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how it fits perfectly true to size and when it rains keeps my dog dry inside, very satisfied with the product, totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great!  Sizing is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The coat is easy to put on our Dane. He LOVES his new coat! It keeps him warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat's Meow

customer_reviews.title: great for warmth and dryness.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps our pup warm AND dry. The entire chest area keeps dry which is important as we walk every day, rain, shine or snow. And our dog has short legs.
customer_reviews.author: Just the Man

customer_reviews.title: ... been hard trying to find a coat for my Great Dane (Suki O Ren Shii)
customer_reviews.text: I has been hard trying to find a coat for my Great Dane (Suki O Ren Shii), this fit her perfectly! Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: mary stone

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to put on and a good fit. I wouldn’t say that it was yellow, more green but a good color.
customer_reviews.author: Scottie

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 88 lb Rottweiler and it was a perfect fit! A star was taken off because it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a size 22 for my 88 lb Rottweiler and it was a perfect fit! A star was taken off because it was a day late and I was so excited to have her try on this jacket the day it was supposed to arrive. But overall, it's worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Shani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our Lab x GSD! She is cozy and happy during the cold days!
customer_reviews.author: Becka Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love it, fits perfect and it was delivered very ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it , fits perfect and it was delivered very fast,,I did order a larger size than recommended for a rottie,i needed to have his butt covered and I ordered a 32"-Love Love it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Nova gives this jacket 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Really like how the jacket is easy to put on. Other jackets my dog rips right off with Velcro on the chest. Also keeps her belly warm as well. Doesn’t restrict her while she is running and playing and I can see her from a mile away. Just wish it had a thicker fleece lining for the freezing New York winters!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a Great Dane. Love the chest protection and the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a Great Dane. Love the chest protection and the way it fastens on and stays on despite hard play. Not the warmest due to the light interior but it keeps them dry and is windproof. Great Value and excellent craftsmenship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. It’s really well-made, it keeps him dry, and he doesn’t seem to mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Peepee Rebozo

customer_reviews.title: Fits my two standard poodles great and they actually like wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Fits my two standard poodles great and they actually like wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: hoppy63

customer_reviews.title: this coat is great. keeps my dog warm and wraps under the ...
customer_reviews.text: this coat is great. keeps my dog warm and wraps under the chest and around belly so it stays on when they run around. the ones that velcro around the neck are a problem when my dog runs, it pops off. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Weatherbeeta doesn't fail.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Weatherbeeta products for my horses with great success. I expected no less with this product and I have not been disappointed. With that being said, if you dog is skiddish with strange noises the nylon exterior of this coat could pose an issue.
customer_reviews.author: ShyMom712

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for a New England short hair small dog.
customer_reviews.text: fits my sooth fox terrier perfectly! he loves to get his coat on and go for our morning walk!
customer_reviews.author: Mike johns

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Had it about 3 months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog appears to be very warm while wearing it. Great quality. Had it about 3 months now and put it on him several times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brower

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Pet seems to not be restricted wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth gesek

customer_reviews.title: Well made coat for any large or deep chested dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made coat for any large or deep chested dog. I own a Weimaraner and this coat keeps him warm on our outdoor walks and runs
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat for my lab. The one piece chest area is a Plus for keeping it on and in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great fit and it stays on!
customer_reviews.text: The 50cm fits our 34lb Border Collie very well with plenty of room in the middle for a heavier dog of similar length. It’s easy to put on and it stays on much better than ones without the under-tummy piece that’s attached by velcro. Also, it’s machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: stolirico

customer_reviews.title: Great coat! Our beagle doesn't mind wearing it or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great coat! Our beagle doesn't mind wearing it or putting it on, because of how easy it is. Allows him to go outside and stay outside on cold days, that way he isn't wanting to come in and out over and over.
customer_reviews.author: BRM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice coat. It does not rub their legs like some of them do . Bought one at the end of last year and decided to get one in yellow for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Medium weight is perfect for our Golden Retriever. Adjustable for a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Samaniego
